name: United Force of Osiris (pre Alpha)
description:
Defend Battle Station Osiris from the Galactic Invaders.
This is a fast-paced game for competitive players that like to blow up stuff. Settle the issue with the enemy force once and for all and save this star-system from corruption. Play as a single-player for an immersive AI-experience or multi-player against your friends for a last man standing competition.



Features:
  • Single player with fun AI enemies
  • or multi-player for a “king of the hill” competition.
  • Different type of space ships to choose from, depending on your pilot style.
  • A unique comic style.
  • A free dedicated server for you and your friends to play on.
http://spacegaming.eu/
